p.strong: In line with government regulations, The Connaught will remain open to accommodate guests travelling for specific purposes only. Please view more here.

div.p: Stays until and including 31 March 2021 will be subject to VAT at 5%, and VAT will return to 20% from 1 April 2021.

p.span: To book a room for 3 or more guests, please call +44 (0)20 7107 8945

div.p:
To ensure you receive the best user experience, our site will use cookies to store information in your browser.
To find out more view our Cookie Policy, continued use of this site indicates you have accepted this policy.
